definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Authigenic zeolites are index minerals for the growing band of secondary pores.

sentences.english: The expected effect was achieved and the powdered zeolite could realize reusing.

sentences.english: Eodiagenesis is characterized by the assemblage of carbonate-analcime-anhydrite, while authigenic kaolinite is found in some strata.

sentences.english: The molybdosilicate blue spectrophotometric method for the determination of silicon content in zeolite molecular sieves was proposed.

sentences.english: Catalytic performance and demerit in ETO of different types of zeolite catalysts are compared.

sentences.english: This consists of thousands of zeolite spheres, two to three millimetersp in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的系統由成千上萬直徑兩到三毫米的沸石球組成。

sentences.english: It is separated from the xylene mixture by crystallization or zeolite adsorption.

sentences.english: The highly pure mineral stellerite mined in Chetian of Ziyuan Country, Guangxi has been used to make desiccants in our lab.

sentences.english: Analcite technological parameters of water treatment were deeply researched.
